scripts.start: lerna run start --parallel --scope mdmf-shell --scope mdmf-profile --scope mdmf-react-ts
scripts.test: lerna run test --scope mdmf-shell --scope mdmf-profile --scope mdmf-shared-libs
scripts.lint: lerna run lint --scope mdmf-shell --scope mdmf-profile --scope mdmf-react-ts --scope mdmf-shared-libs
scripts.clean: lerna run clean --parallel --scope mdmf-shell --scope mdmf-profile --scope mdmf-react-ts --scope mdmf-shared-libs
scripts.remove:sub_node_modules: lerna run remove:node_modules --parallel --scope mdmf-shell --scope mdmf-profile --scope mdmf-react-ts --scope mdmf-shared-libs
